questionsList.question: Discuss the nature-nurture debate in Psychology [4 marks]. Write a sample description paragraph to answer this question worth 4 marks total.
Discuss the cognitive approach to treating depression [4 marks]. Write a sample description paragraph to answer this question worth 4 marks total.
Discuss research into the influence of early attachment on childhood and/or adult relationships. [4 marks]. Write a sample description paragraph to answer this question worth 4 marks total.
Discuss research into caregiver-infant interactions in humans. [4 marks]. Write a sample description paragraph to answer this question worth 4 marks total.

Describe how situational variables have been found to affect obedience. Discuss what box these situational variables tell us about why we obey. [4 marks]. Write a sample description paragraph to answer this question worth 4 marks total.

Outline Lorenz’s and Harlow’s animal studies of attachment. Discuss what these studies might tell us about human attachment. [4 marks]. Write a sample description paragraph to answer this question worth 4 marks total.
Discuss research into minority influence. [4 marks]. Write a sample description paragraph to answer this question worth 4 marks total.
Discuss research into the effects of anxiety on the accuracy of eyewitness testimony [4 marks]. Write a sample description paragraph to answer this question worth 4 marks total.
Discuss ways of studying the brain. [4 marks]. Write a sample description paragraph to answer this question worth 4 marks total.
Discuss localisation of function in the brain. [4 marks]. Write a sample description paragraph to answer this question worth 4 marks total.
